				[1708] heading 'Product Quick Look'
				[1711] list ''
					[1712] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'Specifications: Magnification: Optical 5x Night Vision Device Type: Monocular Objective Lens Diameter: 40 mm Objective Adjustment Range: 0.6~+0.6?diopter Function:?takes photos and records videos Viewing Range: Low Light 2m ~ infinite; No Light < 200m (656 ft) Working Voltage: DC 3.7V? Battery Type: Rechargeable Lilon battery Color: Shown as picture Size: Approx. 200 * 86 * 56 mm / 7.8 * 3.3 * 2.2 inch?? Weight: Approx. 757 g Package Included: 1 * Night Camera 1 * Battery 1 * Charger with cable 1 * Camera Pouch 1 * Accessory Bag 1 * Hand Strap 1 * USB Cable 1 * TV Cable 1 * Cleaning Cloth 1 * Manual'
					[1714] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'HIGH NIGHT VISION CAMERAThe CMOS sensor offers clear view up to 5X magnification, premium glass lens with multiple coatings provides high quality images even in dark night with low light.'
					[1716] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'INFRARED HUNTING CAMERAInfrared illuminator allows up to 200 meter viewing distance in the dark, with auxiliary lighting for clearer photo shooting and video recording.'
					[1718] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'MULTIFUNCTIONAL IR DIGITAL TELESCOPEIt is easy to operate and the recording and other functions are easy to navigate. Camouflage surface is suitable for hunting, bird watching, shooting;scouting;security and surveillance;camping;exploring;nighttime navigation;night fishing;wildlife observation;hiking,travelling;scenery, etc.'
					[1720] listitem ''
						ListMarker '•'
						StaticText 'GREAT CAMOUFLAGE INFRARED CAMERA FOR YOUWith various accessories for equipment and easy storage and carrying. Package List: 1 * Night Camera; 1 * Battery; 1 * Charger with cable; 1 * Camera Pouch; 1 * Accessory Bag; 1 * Hand Strap; 1 * USB Cable; 1 * TV Cable; 1 * Cleaning Cloth; 1 * Manual.'
					[1722] listitem ''
